item.title: Kasa Smart WiFi Motion Sensor Switch, Single Pole, Needs Neutral Wire, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Light Switch, Compatible with Alexa & Google Home, UL Certified, No Hub Required(KS200M),White,1-Pack
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The KS200M is smart switch with an advanced motion and ambient light sensor built in. Ideal for areas where hand-free operation is ideal, the KS200M is perfect for those who want more automation in their home, including those with limited mobility or those with children in the home. Walk into ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:12 UTC – Details)


The KS200M is smart switch with an advanced motion and ambient light sensor built in. Ideal for areas where hand-free operation is ideal, the KS200M is perfect for those who want more automation in their home, including those with limited mobility or those with children in the home. Walk into a room and have your lights automatically turn on. Lights can be programmed to turn off after a set time without motion detection to save on electricity. The smart switch also includes an ambient light sensor that will detect daylight conditions and prevent the lights from turning on during the daytime if desired. Fully customize your experience with settings based on your routine. Best of all, the KS200M is hands-free, voice controllable, and app accessed. From Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, to Samsung SmartThings, the Kasa Smart KS200M gives you convenient voice controls.You can expect Kasa Smart quality with the KS200M which has undergone rigorous safety testing and has been UL certified by 3rd party Underwriter Laboratories. In addition, the device is backed by an industry leading 2-year limited warranty. If you are one of the 7 million plus Kasa Smart users, you will also appreciate that the KS200M is compatible with other Kasa devices meaning, you can set groups, and smart actions to work in conjunction with other Kasa Smart devices.Take control of your smart lighting, and have total automated freedom with the Kasa Smart KS200M Smart Switch with motion sensor.This which can achieve more automation, intelligence, and personalized settings. Standard: IEEE802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi Standard: 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi only Max load: 600W INC, 3000 W CFL/LED. Power Supply: AC 100~125 V, 50/60 Hz Neutral Wire Required. 2-year warranty.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.06 x 3.33 x 1.82 inches; 3.52 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ KS200M
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TP-LINK
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B099KGWGQM
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Vietnam

【Advanced Motion Detection】Completely hands-free and smart operation of your connected lights. The switch automatically turns lights on when motion is detected and turns off after a preset time. Ideal for areas such as bedrooms, hallways and restrooms where hands-free operation is ideal.
【Daylight Detection】Smart ambient light detection will sense daylight and prevent lights from turning on during the day.
【Smart Mode & Away Mode】Set different light triggers based on your routine for effortless control. Automatically turns devices on and off at different times to give the appearance that someone is home.
【Works w/ All Bulb Types】600W Incandescent/Halogen, 300W LED/CFL/MLV/ELV
【Voice & App Control】Manage your device with voice commands via Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, or Samsung SmartThings. Hands-free operation of your lights from anywhere through the free Kasa app.
【Trusted & Reliable】The KS200M is UL certified, meaning rigorous testing is done for safety and certified by a 3rd party laboratory. Includes our industry leading 2-year warranty. Kasa is trusted by over 7 million users worldwide.
【Kasa Smart Action】A part of the Kasa Smart Ecosystem, the switch works with other Kasa devices, so you can set smart actions, and groupings with your other Kasa devices.
【Guided Setup】As with all Kasa products, you can follow the easy to use Kasa app to guide you through the install process. This product requires a neutral wire for installation. If you are not familiar with electrical wiring, we always recommend using a licensed electrician to help with the installation.

Motion-Activated Lighting

With advanced motion-sensing technology, the KS200M Smart Switch eliminates the need to manually turn on/off your lights. No more fumbling for the lights in the dark or while holding your groceries. Upgrade your light switch and experience next level convenience for your family.

State of the Art Motion Sensor

The KS200M features a state-of-the-art motion sensor with an ultra-wide field of view and able to detect motion up to 25 ft. away. Rest-assured knowing that motion will be detected from near or far when you need it.

Previous page

  1. Ambient Light Detection

    The light sensor allows you to use the environmental lighting as a smart trigger for Smart Controls.

  2. Smart Control

    Set the light to turn on/off with light-based, motion-based, or manual triggers during set hours.

  3. Cost and Energy Saving

    Save money and energy by turning off automatically if no motion is detected or if it’s bright.

Next page

1 Ambient Light Detection 2 Smart Control 3 Cost and Energy Saving

Previous page

  1. Voice Control

    Have Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant get the lights instead, leaving you hands free!

  2. App Control

    Set the lights from anywhere, anytime via the free and intuitive app, along with all Kasa devices.

  3. Manually Control

    Turn on/off with a simple tap of the switch, or double-tap to turn it on for a set amount of time.

Next page

1 Voice Control 2 App Control 3 Manually Control

Designed for Safety

This switch is UL Certified. UL94-V0 PC flame-retardant materials help minimize burning hazards.

Schedules

Easily create an automatic schedule for your lights any day of the week following your daily routine.

Timer

Set a timer to turn off your connected device automatically as needed.

Group

Combine your smart switch with other Kasa Smart devices for seamless control with a single tap on Kasa app.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:12 UTC – Details)

if (!url) {

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

offlineCalendar
);
}

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $19.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:49 UTC – Details)


Control your lights, ceiling fans, and other fixtures from anywhere with the HS200. The smart switch replaces any standard light switch, and connects to your home Wi-Fi in no time through the free Kasa app. Kasa also lets you manage connected fixtures with your smartphone or tablet, including setting schedules, timers and countdowns. For added convenience, you can use your voice to control the HS200 when paired with works with Amazon Alexa, Google assistant and Microsoft cortana.Input Voltage: 100 – 120 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 15 A.
Easy guided install: Neutral wire is required, standard wall plate size. No need to understand complex switch wiring or master vs auxiliary switch configurations; The Kasa app guides you through easy step by step installation. Need 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection
Control from anywhere: Monitor your light status. Turn electronics on and off from anywhere with your smartphone using the Kasa app, whether you are at home, in the office or on vacation
Voice control: Enjoy the hands-free convenience of controlling the lights in your home with your voice via Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant; perfect for times when your hands are full or entering a dark room
Scheduling: Use timer or countdown schedules to set your smart switch to automatically turn on and off while you’re home or away. Enable ‘away mode’ to randomly switch on and off to trick potential intruders
Trusted and reliable: Designed and developed in silicon valley, Kasa is trusted by over 4 million users. UL certified for safety use.

Previous page

  1. Voice Control

    Use simple voice commands to control your switch with Alexa or Google Assistant.

  2. Control from Anywhere

    Control your lights, ceiling fans, and other fixtures from anywhere via the Kasa Smart app.

  3. Set Schedules

    Automate your connected fixtures to follow your daily schedule and preferences.

Next page

1 Voice Control 2 Control from Anywhere 3 Set Schedules

Away Mode

Set your smart light switch to turn connected fixtures on and off at random intervals to give the appearance you're home even while you're away.

Grouping & Scene

Group your smart switch with other smart devices to control them all simultaneously, or set custom scenes to match any occasion like waking up.

Network
NO 5G AND NFC
Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. networks. TCL 30 SE android phone is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

Note
* TCL 30 SE is single SIM mobile phone, does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.
* Wifi calling supported on these carriers: T-mobile, Metro, Straight talk/tracfone t-mobile sim card, simple, walmart family mobile, ultra mobile, mint mobile.

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 64GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.


Previous page

  1. PREMIUM DISPLAY, INTUITIVE FEATURES

    Enjoy the expansive 6.52” display, powered by NXTVISION. Watch as your videos and photos come to life with vibrant true-to-life color enhancements and real-time HDR upscaling.

  2. BINGE WITHOUT WORRY

    Adaptive Eye care modes reduce harmful blue lights, turn monochromatic for a booklike feel, and promotes readability in direct sunlight.

Next page

Previous page

  1. INTELLIGENTLY BEAUTIFUL

    Capturing stunning photos and HD video has never been so easy with AI-powered 50MP triple rear camera system with 2MP Depth and Macro lens.

  2. COMPLETE ANY CHALLENGE

    Use the built-in features to make taking the perfect photo even easier, with Gesture Shot a simple movement can activate the countdown timer and Steady Snap to capture motion with less blur.

  3. BEAUTIFULLY YOU

    Show your best side in video chats using the 8MP front-facing camera, while HDR elevates all your stunning selfies.

Next page

Previous page

  1. MAXIMUM RELIABILITY

    Take on your day or new adventures with a powerful 5000mAh battery delivers a days worth of mixed-use on a single charge letting you focus on the task at hand and not searching for the next outlet.

  2. MORE FOR YOU TO ENJOY

    Feel the sublime user experience powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core processor and multitask to your hearts delight with 4GB of RAM for always smooth performance.

  3. ENOUGH SPACE FOR IT ALL

    Store all of your favorite content with 64GB of internal storage, expandable to 512GB via microSD card (sold separately).

Next page

ARTFULLY CRAFTED, DIGITALLY SECURE

Simple and sleek with a finish that glistens in the light. Biometric security safely stores your data and content so only you can access it.

Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.
